Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using <standardized cell line name>.

Biological replicates.Biological replicates: <number of biological replicates if known, otherwise 'N.D.'>

Technical replicates.Technical replicates: <number of technical replicates if known, otherwise 'N.D.'>

Basic positive control.Basic positive control: <whether a basic positive control was set up or not>
Basic positive control.Description: <description of the positive control if it was used>

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: <whether a basic negative control was set up or not>
Basic negative control.Description: <description of the negative control if it was used>

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: <whether validation controls for pathogenic/likely pathogenic variants were included or not>

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: <whether validation controls for benign/likely benign variants were included or not>

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: <description of the statistical analysis method used in the experimental protocol>

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: <threshold for normal results if known, otherwise determine it based on your own knowledge>

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: <threshold for abnormal results if known, otherwise determine it based on your own knowledge>

Approved assay.Approved assay: <whether the experimental protocol used in the literature is generally used for studying this disease or not>
